Question: This person did his part by hitting .393 with three homers and seven RBI.
Hints: On April 27, 1971, this person hit his 600th career home run, the third player ever to do so.
On April 15, this person collected his first major league hit, a double off Cardinals' pitcher Vic Raschi.
At the end of the season, this person again finished third in the MVP voting.
